steps.title: Split your strands into two, equal groups.
steps.content: Split your strands into two, equal groups. You should have four strands in the left group, and four strands in the right. Spread the strands out so that you can see all of them. Keep a wide space between the two groups.

steps.title: Weave the first left strand through the other left strands.
steps.content: Weave the first left strand through the other left strands. Take the first strand on the left-hand side. Weave it over, under, and over across the next three strands.

steps.title: Add the woven left strand to the right group.
steps.content: Add the woven left strand to the right group. Take the left strand that you just finished weaving, and shift it over until it joins the right group. Your left group should now have three strands, and your right group should have five.

steps.title: Repeat the process on the right side, but in reverse.
steps.content: Repeat the process on the right side, but in reverse. Take the last strand from the right-hand group. Weave it under, over, and under across the previous three strands. It should now be in the middle of your braid, between the two sections.

steps.title: Add it to the left group.
steps.content: Add it to the left group. Take the right strand that you just finished weaving. Scoot it over until it joins the left group. Both the left group and right group should now have four strands.

steps.title: Repeat the process until your braid reaches the length you want.
steps.content: Repeat the process until your braid reaches the length you want. Remember, always start with the outermost left or right strand. Begin weaving "over" on the left side, and "under" on the right.

steps.title: Have all strands laid out and visible.
steps.content: Have all strands laid out and visible. It would be easiest if you have the outermost left and right strands level with the top of your braid, and the other strands spread out between them.

steps.title: Bring the top right under to the left side.
steps.content: Bring the top right under to the left side. Take the last/furthest strand in the right group. Pass it under all previous seven stands, until it comes out on the far left side.

steps.title: Weave the strand through the next four strands.
steps.content: Weave the strand through the next four strands. Take the strand that you just set down. Weave it under, over, under, and over through the next four strands.

steps.title: Repeat the process on the left side.
steps.content: Repeat the process on the left side. Take the first, outermost strand in your left group. Pull it behind all other strands, until it comes out on the right. Pass it under, over, under, and over across the previous four strands.

steps.title: Repeat the process until your braid is the length you want it to be.
steps.content: Repeat the process until your braid is the length you want it to be. Gently tug on the strands every so often to tighten them.

steps.title: Split your strands into two, even groups.
steps.content: Split your strands into two, even groups. You want to have four strands in the left group, and four strands in the right. Spread the strands out so that they are all visible. Leave a gap between the two groups.

steps.title: Cross the two middle strands.
steps.content: Cross the two middle strands. Take the last strand in the left group, and the first strand in the right group. Cross the left strand under the right one to form a small X, as close to the top as you can.

steps.title: Bring the last right strand under the previous three strands.
steps.content: Bring the last right strand under the previous three strands. Take the last, outermost right strand. Pull it under the three strands just before it.

steps.title: Pull the strand under and across the next strand.
steps.content: Pull the strand under and across the next strand. Pull the right strand under one more strand, then flip it to the right, forming another X. There should be three strands to the right of it, and four strands to the left.

steps.title: Weave the first left strand under the next three strands.
steps.content: Weave the first left strand under the next three strands. Take the first strand in the left group. Pull it under the next three strands, towards the middle.

steps.title: Bring the strand under and over the next strand.
steps.content: Bring the strand under and over the next strand. Weave the left strand under one more strand, then immediately pull it to the left. There should be three strands to the left of it, and four strands to the right.

steps.title: Repeat the process until your braid is the length you want it to be.
steps.content: Repeat the process until your braid is the length you want it to be. Continue weaving the outermost right strand under the previous three strands, then under and over the fourth one. Follow up by weaving the first left strand under the next three, then under and over the fourth. Tug on the strands every so often to keep the braid nice and tight.

steps.title: Split your strands into two groups.
steps.content: Split your strands into two groups. You should have four strands in each group. Make sure that all strands are visible and not clumped together. You should have a visible gap between the two groups.

steps.title: Bring the last right strand under the previous three strands.
steps.content: Bring the last right strand under the previous three strands. Take the outermost right strand. Bring it under the three right strands just before it. It will end up in the middle between the two groups.

steps.title: Pull the strand under the next two strands.
steps.content: Pull the strand under the next two strands. Take the strand you just set down. Bring it under the next two strands, towards the left. Keep the gap between the left group and the right group visible.

steps.title: Wrap the strand back to the middle.
steps.content: Wrap the strand back to the middle. Pull the strand through the middle of the left group, then pull it back to the right, crossing it over the two inner left strands. You essentially just wove the strand under and over those two left strands.

steps.title: Add the strand back to the right group.
steps.content: Add the strand back to the right group. You are now back where you started.

steps.title: Repeat the process on the left side.
steps.content: Repeat the process on the left side. Pull the outermost left strand under the other three left strands. Wrap it under and around the next to strands so that it ends up back in the middle. Add it back to the left group.

steps.title: Alternate sides until your braid reaches the length you desire.
steps.content: Alternate sides until your braid reaches the length you desire. Tug on the strands every so often to create a nice, tight braid.
